CustomField.description: Comma-Separated List of Apex Trigger Names to Disable in the Milestones PM+ Package
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This setting allows you to disable individual triggers within the Milestones PM+ package. Enter the Apex class names of the triggers you want to disable, separated by commas. For example: MPM4_Resource_Trigger, Milestone1_Task_Trigger.
CustomField.label: Granular Trigger Disablement
